note:
I drink Huel and Soylent.

I'm a leftist.

I organize along side vegans.

Most of my work is in food solidarity/mutual aid.

I've been blocked or banned by countless vegans over time for not being compelled by their arguments. I do think the topic is interesting: it touches on ethics, economics, philosophy of science, environmentalism, nutrition, and maybe a dozen or a hundred other topics.

So I love talking about it.

Block me if you're a vegan and can't stand being challenged.
